settings.content: TERRA Toddler Nappies are thoughtfully designed to keep up with your little one's active adventures. TERRA Nappies are soft, breathable, and ultra-absorbent, keeping your toddler dry and comfortable as they play, learn, and explore. Made with safe, plant-based materials and dermatologically tested for sensitive skin, they ensure comfort that moves with your child.

settings.heading: Ingredients¬†
settings.content:
• Absorbent core made with premium Japanese materials for superior dryness.
  • 100% FSC-certified natural wood pulp from the USA.
  • Soft tissue layers for extra comfort and absorption.
  • Breathable backsheet made from biodegradable bamboo fibre.
  • Gentle leg cuffs made from biodegradable bamboo fibre (not bamboo viscose).
  • Leak-proof layer made from eco-friendly corn starch.
  • Front tape made from baby-safe, food-grade material.
  • Soft topsheet made from food-grade material.
  • Wetness indicator made from 100% plant-based materials.
  • Printed with non-toxic, food-grade inks.
  • Recyclable kraft paper packaging with rice-based materials.

settings.heading: Key Features of TERRA Nappy
settings.content:
• Breathable Bamboo Back Sheet - Made from 100% biodegradable bamboo fibre for all-day comfort and airflow.
  • Smart Wetness Indicator - Clearly shows when it's time for a change, ensuring freshness and convenience.
  • 12+ Hours of Dryness - Advanced absorption keeps your baby dry, comfortable, and rash-free through day and night.
  • Dermatologically rated 'Excellent' - Safe, gentle, and suitable for even the most sensitive skin.
  • Super Absorbent Core - Crafted with 100% USA natural wood pulp and Japanese SAP for superior leak protection.
  • 3D Leak Guard Technology - Secure fit and crevice leg design actively prevent leaks and side spills.
  • Ultra-Soft High-Back Waistband - Offers a secure, flexible fit to support movement and crawling comfort.

settings.heading: Delivery  and  return policy
settings.content:
Our team will¬†ship your order within 5 business days. The time it takes to receive your order depends on the shipping method chosen at checkout.¬†

We hope you to love it, but if you need to make a return, breathe easy. Returns are always free and can be done in person or by mail.¬†

settings.heading: Find the Perfect Fit

settings.text: From newborn snuggles to toddler tumbles, our easy size chart helps you choose the right Terra Nappy for every stage. Gentle, comfy, and planet-friendly, because every baby deserves the perfect fit.

settings.heading: Video scene
A New Generation of Plant-Based Nappies
CIRCULAR BY DESIGN

settings.text:
We design for the end from the very start.
Every part of our packaging is¬†paper-based, recyclable or compostable, and plastic-free down to the cloth core. Even¬†off-cuts are re-purposed, turned into¬†fish bait, cleaning pads, or donated to local kindergartens¬†for crafts.

settings.heading: A New Generation of Plant-Based Nappies
MADE THE NATURAL WAY

settings.text:
We took a different path, building our own dedicated manufacturing network and long-term local partners, so we know exactly¬†where and how every part is made.

We choose¬†only naturally processed materials¬†and¬†source ingredients locally wherever possible, reducing transport miles while ensuring¬†complete traceability, safety, and freshness.

This level of control is how we make sure¬†every product truly reflects our values, from the very first fibre to the final pack.

settings.heading: Follow @terra.co.nz
Frequently Asked Questions

settings.text: Explore answers to the most common questions about Terra Nappies, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.

settings.heading: What makes Terra nappies different from regular nappies?
settings.content: Terra nappies are crafted from up to 85% plant-based materials, including bamboo fibre and FSC-certified wood pulp. They're free from harsh chemicals, plastics, and synthetic fragrances, offering a safer and more sustainable alternative to conventional nappies.

settings.heading: Are Terra infant nappies safe for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Toddler nappies are dermatologically tested and rated "excellent," making them suitable for all skin types. They contain no chlorine, latex, parabens, fragrances, or other common irritants.

settings.heading: Are Terra Toddler nappies biodegradable?
settings.content: Terra nappies contain biodegradable components, such as bamboo fibre, and a plant-based absorbent core. While they are not fully compostable due to hygiene regulations, they break down faster than traditional nappies, helping reduce long-term environmental impact.

settings.heading: How long can my baby wear a Terra Toddler nappy?
settings.content: Terra Toddler nappies are designed to keep your baby dry for up to 12 hours. The high-performance, plant-based absorbent core provides reliable protection for both daytime use and overnight comfort.

settings.heading: Do Terra nappies have a wetness indicator?
settings.content: Yes, Terra nappies feature a plant-based wetness indicator that changes colour as moisture increases, making it easy to know when it's time for a change.

settings.heading: What sizes do Terra nappies come in?
settings.content: Terra nappies are available in a full range of sizes, from newborn to toddler.

settings.heading: How do I choose the right size nappy for my baby?
settings.content: Check your baby's weight and use the size chart on the packaging. If you notice leaks or red marks around the legs or waist, consider sizing up.

settings.heading: How often should I change my baby's nappy?
settings.content: At the Toddler stage, babies typically need 8-10 nappy changes a day. Always change a soiled nappy promptly to maintain skin health and comfort.

settings.heading: Why are Terra Toddler nappies ideal for newborns?
settings.content: They're designed with ultra-soft materials, breathable bamboo fibre, and a flexible fit that gently supports your baby's natural movement. The chemical-free core and snug leg cuffs help protect delicate skin and reduce the risk of irritation.

settings.heading: What nappy size should I choose for my newborn baby?
settings.content: If your baby weighs between 3-6 kg (6-13 lbs), the Terra Toddler nappy size is the perfect fit. For the most accurate sizing, we recommend using the nappy size chart on our website.

settings.heading: Are Terra Toddler Nappies suitable for overnight use?
settings.content: Yes, with up to 12 hours of absorbency, Terra Toddler nappies provide overnight dryness and comfort to support longer, undisturbed sleep.

settings.heading: Do Terra Toddler Nappies help reduce the risk of nappy rash?
settings.content: Yes, the breathable, bamboo-based materials and chemical-free design reduce moisture build-up and irritation, which are common triggers of nappy rash.

settings.heading: How do Terra Toddler Nappies support movement and comfort?
settings.content: Terra Toddler nappies are designed with a soft, stretchy waistband and side panels that adapt to your baby's natural movements without slipping or digging in.

settings.heading: Are Terra Toddler Nappies easy to change on an active baby?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Toddler nappies come with flexible tabs and a secure fit system, making nappy changes easier even when your baby's on the go.

settings.heading: Can Terra Toddler Nappies handle frequent wetting during the newborn stage?
settings.content: Absolutely, the sustainable, plant-based core and advanced leak protection are engineered to absorb effectively, even with frequent urination.

settings.heading: Is the Terra Toddler Nappies packaging eco-friendly too?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Toddler nappies packaging is made from recyclable craft paper and rice-based materials, aligned with our commitment to reducing plastic use.
